name: Alstom
membership: Alstom is a member of a number of associations including, but not limited to: UNIFE, UITP, AFEP, MEDEF, Shift2Rail,  Hydrogen Europe and the Platform for Electro-Mobility.
goal:
As a promoter of sustainable mobility, Alstom develops and markets systems, equipment and services for the transport sector.
Alstom offers a complete range of solutions (from high-speed trains to metros, tramways and e-buses), passenger solutions, customised services (maintenance, modernisation), infrastructure, signalling and digital mobility solutions.
Alstom is a world leader in integrated transport systems.
The company recorded sales of €8.1 billion and booked €12.1 billion of orders in the 2018/19 fiscal year. Headquartered in France, Alstom is present in 60 countries and employs 36,300 people.
interests: Banking and financial services, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Environment, External Relations, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
. Transport policy, sustainable mobility, railway policy, infrastructure funding and financing.
. Trade policy, R&D and Competition policy.
